attributes.action: Make it illegal for people to send funds to the Shabaab, an Islamic group who recently stoned a 13 year old to death because she had been raped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been reported that a large number of people in the UK are sending money (amounting to thousands per week) to the Shabaab.  This group is responsible for very violent enforcement of Sharia law in Somalia, including the recent stoning to death of a 13 year old girl because she complained to the police of being gang-raped.

The Shabaab should be classed as a terrorist organisation and therefore people caught sending money to it should be arrested/deported.

Whilst the UK is engaged in the global war on terror it cannot harbour people who fund such groups.
